to the west. Travellers going further north usually leave the train in Fauske, and continue their trip north with buses towards Narvik.

three times a day. Costs 407 NOK and takes around 4,5 hours.

value: Drive 44 km east from Fauske to the village of Sulitjelma, where high mountains (Suliskongen reaches almost 2,000 m)  and two large glaciers (Sulitjelmaisen and Blåmansisen - Norways 5.largest) are within hiking range. Sulitjelma has lodging opportunities, and there is also Jakobsbakken a little further, which is an excellent base for cross country skiing in winter and early spring, and mountain hiking from July to late September.
